string.text: Fast Hands
Increases your stow and ready speed.
Ghost Ammo
You have a chance to refund ammo when hitting a target (chance doubles on a critical hit).
Gunslinger
You now deal increased damage with Pistols and SMGs.
Rifleman
You now deal increased damage with Assault Rifles.
Heavy Gunner
You now deal increased damage with Shotguns, Snipers, and Explosive Weapons (excludes grenades).
Berserker
You deal increased melee damage and take reduced damage when you have a melee weapon in your hand.
Jamming Shot
You can now jam an enemy's weapon when shooting them in the arm.
Bloody Mess
When killing an enemy, they have a 1% chance to explode, damaging anyone caught in the blast.
Headhunter
When killing an enemy with a headshot, you gain a small amount of rank and reputation with friendly factions.
Disarming Shot
Shooting an enemy's weapon has a chance for them to drop it on the ground.
Scavenger
When looting an enemy, you have a small chance to find salvage and crafting materials.
Careful Handler
When looting armor and weapons from an enemy, they will have a minimum condition of 15%.
Master Craftsman
When crafting or cooking, you have a small chance to make 2 items for the cost of 1.
Cyber-Medic
You have become outfitted with an implant tha helps to slowly stop bleeding wounds.
Dodger
You have a small chance to dodge any incoming damage.
Comfort Food
When eating or drinking, you will receive a health bonus equal to their thirst or hunger restore (whichever restore is highest)
Ammo Finder
Increases the amount of ammo found when looting a body.
Medicine Man
When looting an enemy, you have a chance to find a medical item. Item quality increases with this perk's level.
Arte-finder
When looting an enemy, you have a small chance to find an artefact native to your current location. Additionaly, any artefact you find will now have higher-than-normal efficiency.
Midas' Touch
You will receive bonus cash when looting it from dead enemies.
Master of the Zone
You have learned the tricks of the Zone and how to tap into the Noosphere. With this power, any artefacts attached to your belt will slowly begin to repair themselves.
Plate Finder
When looting an enemy, you have a small chance to find a damaged Kevlar Plate on them.
Spiked
When taking damage, your enemy is also hurt for a portion of said damage.
Anomaly Defense
Anomalies will deal reduced damage to you.
Iron Resolve
You will now recover faster from any dizziness or drunkeness effects.
Silver-Tongued
When bartering, you receive better prices when buying or selling.
Mutant Slayer
You now deal more damage to mutants.
Vampirism
Vampirism - When killing an enemy, you are granted 2.5% Health and Stamina.
Warmonger
When killing an enemy, you receive a third of your weapon's magazine size as ammo to your backpack (Min. mag size of 3).
